name: naluxrp
description: NaluXrp/ │ ├── index.html │ ├── css/ │   └── style.css │ ├── js/ │   ├── xrpl-connection.js     ← live XRPL link + streaming │   ├── ui.js                  ← navbar, themes, toggles, animations │   ├── utils.js               ← helper & export functions │   ├── validators.js          ← UNL list + validator metrics │   ├── tokens.js              ← live token data + price feeds │   ├── amm.js                 ← liquidity pool data │   ├── profile.js             ← user wallet + NFTs + bio │   ├── history.js             ← ledger + account history │   ├── analytics.js           ← advanced metrics, sparkline data │   ├── nfts.js                ← NFT display, mint, metadata │   ├── explorer.js            ← tx / account search │   ├── news.js                ← XRPL ecosystem + dev news │   ├── settings.js            ← preferences + node selector │   └── about.js               ← about / credits / contact │ └── assets/     ├── icons/     ├── backgrounds/     └── logo.png
